Html:
On the Fly is an open source application available at Codeplex (http://onthefly.codeplex.com/) which enables you to compile all of your TypeScript files with just 1 click of a button.

A stable release is available, and we are accepting suggestions, and feedback is very welcome. A complete User Guide is also available for download.
Nice project, but there is a simpler solution: on-the-fly compilation of TypeScript code into JavaScript code in a browser, using TypeScript Compile.
